welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kapsabet, Kenya! This charming city is known for its stunning landscapes and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Kapsabet has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eldoret Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Eldoret Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for a small fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Kakamega Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kakamega Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
